text: Beeyladoota wareega Kaâ€™abaa mallattoolee Rabbii irraa isiniif gooneIsaan keessa gaggaariitu isiniif jiraOdoo sakaalamanii jiranuu maqaa Rabbii isaan irratti faarsaaYeroo cinaachi ishee kufte ishee irraa nyaadhaa; hiyyeessa nama hin kadhanneefi isa kadhatu nyaachisaaAkka isin galata galchitaniif Nuti akka kanatti ishee (beeyladoota) isiniif laaffifne
